DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind , placebo-controlled , Phase IV trial , compare HMS 90® versus placebo ( soy protein ) add-on ( adjuvant ) therapy subject idiopathic Parkinson 's Disease . The principal objective evaluate change biomarkers oxidative stress , plasma amino acid , well improvement clinical symptom brain function
